A

.

II. STANDARDS AND CONTROLS

»



The following standards and controls represent a summary of major pro-
visions in the Proposed Form of Disposition Agreement. They are in-
cluded here solelyfor the convenience of prospective developers interested
in submitting proposals for development, and should not be construed as
representing all of the requirements in that Agreement. The standards an’&
controls listed below are illustrated on, and refer to, the exhibits on pages
10 and 14.

A, TYPES OF FACILITIES



The following uses will be permitted in Development Area 12:

Office Building Facilities

Facilities for Retailing, Retail Services, and Related
Commercial Activities

Tenant Parking Facilities

Commercial Public Parking Facilities

B. SIZE OF FACILITIES



Minimum net rentable office space - 250,000 square feet
Maximum net rentable office space - 300,000 square feet
Retail space - In Area '"B'", a minimum of 38,000 square feet
at or above ground level; in Area "F', a mini-
mum of 12,000 square feet and a maximum of
24,000 square feet at or above ground level.
Minimum tenant parking - 150 normal size auto spaces

C. HEIGHT AND COVERAGE LIMITATIONS (including setbacks andease-
ments)



1. 100% coverage is permitted up to sidewalk grades; coverage
above sidewalk grades is controlled by height and coverage
limitations described below under Items #3 and #4 below.

2. There are no depth restrictions; the substructure must be de-
signed to protect adjacent structures, streets, and utilities.
For the construction depth of the garage in Area 14, see the
Exhibit on the opposite page.

3. No structure or part thereof shall exceed El. 350"'.
